game.Name: Orcs Must Die Deathtrap
game.description: Step into the role of a powerful War Mage, defend the rift from the grotesque mob, and embrace the chaos of orc annihilation. The castle doors are thrown wide open to exciting new features.
game.start: Orcs Must Die Deathtrap/Orcs Must Die! Deathtrap.exe
